instructions: Open Settings . Go to Passwords & Accounts , or Mail, Contacts, Calendars on some older devices. Select Fetch New Data at the bottom, and then choose the Exchange account you want to edit. On some devices, you won't see the Fetch New Data option, so just tap the Exchange account and then choose Mail Folders to Push . Choose Push if you see that option. Otherwise, select all the folders whose changes you want to be sent to iPhone Mail automatically.
